p: The Swedish Functional Health Literacy scale: This scale comprises five items about persons’ skills in reading and understanding health information. The items can be self-assessed on a five-point Likert scale ranging from ‘never’ to ‘often’. In this study, we have excluded two of the original questions (difficulty reading health information and time to read health information) as these were found to be less relevant in relation to our aim, and we added one open-ended question concerning how to remember information relating to health, illness, and treatment [ 44].
